findings.message:
EthTxOrderDependenceMinimal.setReward() (eth_tx_order_dependence_minimal.sol#18-25) should emit an event for: 
	- reward = msg.value (eth_tx_order_dependence_minimal.sol#24)
findings.name: events-maths

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.16 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder
	- ZeroFunctionSelector.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.16 (eth_tx_order_dependence_minimal.sol#7)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message:
Reentrancy in EthTxOrderDependenceMinimal.claimReward(uint256) (eth_tx_order_dependence_minimal.sol#27-33):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(reward) (eth_tx_order_dependence_minimal.sol#31)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- claimed = true (eth_tx_order_dependence_minimal.sol#32)
findings.name: reentrancy-unlimited-gas

findings.message:
Reentrancy in EthTxOrderDependenceMinimal.setReward() (eth_tx_order_dependence_minimal.sol#18-25):
	External calls:
	- owner.transfer(reward) (eth_tx_order_dependence_minimal.sol#23)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reward = msg.value (eth_tx_order_dependence_minimal.sol#24)
findings.name: reentrancy-unlimited-gas
